mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, user_name, nick_name, password, email, create_time, update_time) VALUE (#{id},#{userRegisterDto.userName},#{userRegisterDto.nickName},#{userRegisterDto.password},#{userRegisterDto.email},now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password=#{password} ,update_time=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, refresh_token, status FROM user WHERE user_name=#{userName}
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_name=#{userName}
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT nick_name,avatar,sex,id AS userId FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE nick_name=#{nickName}
